author: keithrozario
content:
Thanks Jason. I've corrected the title, hopefully it's less mis-leading now. 

Yup, the Powerline adapter only works with devices that have ethernet ports. For WiFi-only devices try a powerline WiFi extender:

http://www.lazada.com.my/tp-link-300mbps-av500-wifi-powerline-extender-starter-kit-543407.html



Keith
